items.title: Audacity Professional Vocals for Courses Video & More Part 2
items.headline: Edit existing vocal recordings to remove mistakes, reduce noise, and optimize levels, using Audacity FREE audio software
objectives_summary: Improve the quality of audio vocal recordings used in videos, online courses, YouTube videos, podcasts, narration and voiceover projects, and more, resulting in professional sounding results by using advanced editing features and effects in Audacity free audio recording and editing software, including noise removal, compression, equalization, and normalization, and integrate that edited audio back into the original projects.
